predicate.note: Frames file for 'palm_off' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: split phrasal
example.text: The department is advising residents to plant Sagos, if they must, in the back yard and telling nurseries to be on the lookout for anyone trying [*] to palm one off.

example.name: joined phrasal
example.text: That PASOK could win the elections outright is improbable; the Greek press, previously eager [*] to palm off PASOK's line, has turned on Mr. Papandreou with a wild-eyed vengeance.
